title: The Shroud of Turin - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/26/20
itunes:title: The Shroud of Turin - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/26/20
description:
George Noory and author Dr. Andrew Silverman explore his research into the Shroud of Turin, the purported burial cloth of Jesus, and how energy of the human soul created the image of his body on the fabric.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
